 Deduction quantifying both antecedent and consequent, based on Theorem 19.20 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2003.)
statement:
ralimdaa.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
ralimdaa.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
ralimdaa $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A ps -> A. x e. A ch ) ) $.
